entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
